description: Conductor Gustavo Dudamel believes music can lead the way and wants to inspire young people.
title: Maestro Dudamel takes virtual reality Symphony on tour
title_page: Maestro Dudamel takes virtual reality Symphony on tour - BBC News
maintext: "Music is a language without words: it comes to each of us in a unique way and yet it also unites us even though we appreciate it in different ways. For me that is a beautiful symbol for these times - we can embrace each other through music," says the 39-year-old music director of the Los Angeles Philharmonic.
